item.more-axolotls.axolotl_catalog.toolt: Not everything in here applies to the game in 100% correctness
gui.more-axolotls.catalog.desc.lucy: Probably the most famous axolotl type!§ö§öLeucistic or Lucy are the most common Axolotl.§öNormally Leucistic Axolotls have a pink tone of color.§ö§öObtained: Natural Spawning
gui.more-axolotls.catalog.desc.wild: Most closely resembles the specimens from Lake Xochimilco!§ö§öWild have little details on skin.§öNormally Wild Axolotls have darker tones or brown color.§ö§öObtained: Natural Spawning
gui.more-axolotls.catalog.desc.gold: Characterized by its bright Gold skin similar to the ore, this morph is the result of almost all pigments being suppressed except for one that causes Gold.§öThey look so valuable!§ö§öObtained: Natural Spawning
gui.more-axolotls.catalog.desc.cyan: No detailed description provided§ö§öObtained: Natural Spawning
gui.more-axolotls.catalog.desc.blue: Originates from a suggestion from r/Minecraft to Mojang!§öThe Blue Axolotl is based on the Mudkip Pokemon.§öBlue Axolotls are the most rare ones in Minecraft Vanilla, although some people think it exists in Realife, it doesn't!§ö§öObtained: Rare Breeding
gui.more-axolotls.catalog.desc.albino: No detailed description provided§ö§öObtained: Natural Spawning
gui.more-axolotls.catalog.desc.black: No detailed description provided§ö§öObtained: Natural Spawning
gui.more-axolotls.catalog.desc.chimera: Morph that looks like a fused version!§ö§öChimera have little details on skin like wild.§öChimera morphs are created when two eggs fuse together in development, and each side grows according to the egg it came from.§ö§öObtained: Breeding Lucy, Wild
gui.more-axolotls.catalog.desc.enigma: One of the most interesting morphs.§ö§öEnigma's details are parts of the skin of Gold and Black, a mix of beautiful colors making an unique texture.§ö§öObtained: Breeding Gold, Black
gui.more-axolotls.catalog.desc.firefly: Morph that has two colors inherited from its parents, Black and Albino.§ö§öThere are only less than a dozen specimens of this type in the world that were created by Lloyd Strohl II.§öThe most beautiful part are the split colors!§ö§öObtained: Breeding Black, Albino
gui.more-axolotls.catalog.desc.firefly_i: Morph that has two colors inherited from its parents, Black and Albino.§ö§öThere are only less than a dozen specimens of this type in the world that were created by Lloyd Strohl II.§öThe most beautiful part are the split colors!§ö§öObtained: Breeding Black, Albino
gui.more-axolotls.catalog.desc.lapis: Doesn't really exist in real life.§ö§öPictures of Black Axolotls on some camera rolls, due to a color reading error of the camera, turn Blue.§öLapis is the blue with the colors ported by Minecraft§ö§öObtained: Natural Spawning
gui.more-axolotls.catalog.desc.neon: The Neon/Green is a variant that Mojang wanted to add but never did!§ö§öThe variant is probably based on GFP Axolotls.§öThe first time it was shown is in the Caves And Cliffs Update Trailer.§ö§öObtained: Natural Spawning
gui.more-axolotls.catalog.desc.glow: Based on Glow Squids.§ö§öThis variant looks like the Neon/Green.§öSome say that an Axolotl that lives in the deep sea can turn into glow!§ö§öObtained: Natural Spawning
gui.more-axolotls.catalog.desc.piebald: The most common of the rare mutations.§ö§öThe coloring is a Leucistic Axolotl and Black has breed and mutated to have pigment in places in other than just their face§ö§öObtained: Breeding Black, Albino
gui.more-axolotls.catalog.desc.gray: No detailed description provided§ö§öObtained: Natural Spawning
gui.more-axolotls.catalog.desc.drowned: The forgotten sea creature of the depths of the sea.§ö§öThe design of the Drowned Axolotl was inspired by the Drowned Zombie.§öIt has cyan eyes and has moss all over it's body.§ö§öObtained: Rename to "drownelotl"
gui.more-axolotls.catalog.desc.shiny: The shiny version of the Blue Variant!§öThe Design is based on the Shiny version of Mudkip Pokemon that the Blue Variant represents.§ö§öObtained: Rare Breeding
gui.more-axolotls.catalog.desc.mosaic_bl: No detailed description provided§ö§öObtained: Breeding Black, Lucy
gui.more-axolotls.catalog.desc.mosaic_wi: No detailed description provided§ö§öObtained: Breeding Wild, Lucy
gui.more-axolotls.catalog.desc.skeleton: The companion of hostile monsters.§ö§öThe design was inspired by the Skeleton.§öIt only consists of bones and has no gills nor skin.§öAlthough it's probably already dead it behaves like any other axolotls.§ö§öObtained: Rename to "skelotl"
gui.more-axolotls.catalog.desc.rainbow: Probably the most mind blowing axolotl!§ö§öThese axolotls can change the color of the pigments in an extraordinary way.§öThese cases are resulting from a rare genome of axolotls that can occur in really rare cases.§ö§öObtained: Rare Breeding
gui.more-axolotls.catalog.desc.sculk: The Axolotl in process of the evolution to survive in the Deep Dark.§ö§öThere are some Axolotls which didnt evolved perfectly into Warden and got a look similar to the Warden.§öThis Axolotl is blind, cute... but it can sense you!§ö§öObtained: Natural Spawning
